summary: Adds a new race based off Elder Scrolls Lore, and a few other new things too!
descriptionHtml:
--------------------Reasoning/Lore--------------------
Shadowscale is the term given to an Argonian who was born under the Sign of Shadow and trained as an assassin to assist the King of Black Marsh by the Dark Brotherhood. In Skyrim, we don\'t really have Birthsigns, or the option to train from a young age. So instead, I made a new race, let\'s pretend its a class.

--------------------Latest Updates--------------------
1.1 - Fixed a text error seen in the Char Cretion screenshot.
1.0 - Mod Released

--------------------Current Features--------------------
- Fully functional Shadowscale Argonian Race/Class (Lore-Friendly)
- New \"Shadow\" Variation - The Dragonborn can become invisible by sneaking at night
- 2 DB Initiates remade, 2 added, 1 of which is a Shadowscale, too, maybe he shouldn\'t be... :P
- 2 New Enchantments - Water-Walking and Speed
- Special DB Armour set (no model/texture yet)

--------------------Helpful Info--------------------
To get the Shadowscale Armour, type \"help shadowscale\" in the console.
To get the Speed Enchant, head over to the Ragged Flagon to find the \"Journeyman\'s Boots\"
To get the Water-Walking Enchant, go to Calixto\'s House of curiosities in Windhelm.

--------------------Personal Promotion--------------------
To start out as a Dark Brotherhood Initiate (or anything else!), try this mod (It\'s the best!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557

--------------------Overpowered--------------------
Due to their training, Shadowscales have higher stats than most Races at start. They are also completely silent while sneaking. Please don\'t comment on these unless its a genuine problem. I\'m clever enough to set my own skill levels y\'know?

--------------------Permissions--------------------
Go ahead and copy any elements of the mod, Just don\'t ignore me, send a link to my Workshop at the very least. Re-hosting is forbidden, contact me for permissions for anything.

Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=114243078&tscn=1356199786
Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28558
author: VenomD95
